entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
